Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Action
    Action Class defines common Data and Methods to perform an action on the model after a Client's request.
    ActivateLeaderCard
    ActivateLeaderCard Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client request regarding Leader Card activation.
    ActivateProduction
    ActivateProduction Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client request regarding Production activation.
    AddResource
    AddResource Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client request when adding a resource from the Market into his Warehouse.
    BuyCard
    BuyCard Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client's request when buying a card from the DevelopmentCardTable.
    ChooseCardSlot
    ChooseCardSlot Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client's request when choosing a card slot to put the just bought DevelopmentCard.
    ChooseLeaderCard
    ChooseLeaderCard Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client request regarding Leader Card choice when buying a white marble from the market.
    ChooseProductionOutput
    ChooseProductionOutput Class contains data and methods to be used when the player concluded payment for a Production to choose the Production output.
    DiscardLeaderCard
    DiscardLeaderCard class contains data and methods to resolve a Client request regarding Leader Card discard action.
    EndMarket
    EndMarket Class contains data and methods to use when a player wants to end a market interaction, transforming Resources into Faith Points.
    EndTurn
    EndTurn class defines methods to end a player's turn and go to the next one (if the game is Multiplayer)
    InitChooseLeaderCards
    InitChooseLeaderCards Class defines data and methods used to give to the player the two Leader Cards he chooses at the beginning of the game.
    InitChooseResources
    InitChooseResources Class defines data and methods used to give to the player the initial resources he chooses at the beginning of the game.
    MarketChooseRow
    MarketChooseTow Class contains data and methods to resolve a Client request regarding Market shopping.
    PayResource
    PayResource Class defines data and methods to complete a Client's request when paying for a production or a Development Card.
    PayResourceBuyCard
    PayResourceBuyCard Class extends PayResource Class to diversify messages going to the Client for a better response management.
    PayResourceProduction
    PayResourceProduction Class extends PayResource Class to diversify messages going to the Client for a better response management.
    ResetWarehouse
    ResetWarehouse Class contains data and methods to complete a Client's request when wanting to reset his warehouse to initial conditions (when adding resources).
    SwitchDepot
    SwitchDepot Class defines data and methods to complete a Client's request when wanting to switch two depots during an Add interaction.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    ActionType
    ActionType enum Class contains definitions for every possible Action coming from a Client to the Server.
